name: Bouncy Bunnies
storyline:
Bouncy bunnies is a running race game against your friends in a colorful platform world. Take the boost to run faster or find the shortest path to be the first bunny to reach the goal. Choose between 8 different levels. Collect carrots to get higher score.
Keyboard and mouse works but use a controller to get the best experience of the game. You can jump but also double jump to get further.

Host a server and invite your friends to join.
summary: Race against your friends in a colorful platform world. Take the boost to run faster or find the shortest path to be the first bunny to reach the goal. Choose between 8 different levels. Collect carrots to get higher score!
